EmailTemplate.name: Swift_Layer_On_Hold_Warning
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Device <MST> Pending Resume at Layer Level
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Mask Set Title: <MST> Mask Layer(s): <LAYER> _________________________________________________________
Dear Sir/Madam,
Please note that the above mentioned layer is still on-hold despite all its chip(s) has been resumed by process owner(s).
This is a system generated message, please do not reply. Best Regards.
#ECS
